short_summary: TBIPS SA Holders currently holding a TBIPS SA for Tier 2 at the time of bid closing
description: This requirement is for the provision of Informatics professional services to provide ongoing application maintenance and support services and continue with the implementation of new and improved application capabilities for various IT systems including the Buyandsell.gc.ca and GCaccounts applications
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## E60ZR-231480 TBIPS IT Professional Services for Buyandsell.gc.ca and GCaccounts

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: WS3837044573-Doc4316790510
* **Publication Date**: November 20, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 14, 2023 at 14:00:00
* **Trade Agreements**: This tender is open to bidders in accordance with the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, North American Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, and Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership.

### Solicitation Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is seeking Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) under a Supply Arrangement (SA) method of supply. The requirement is for ongoing application maintenance and support services for the Buyandsell.gc.ca and GCaccounts applications. This solicitation is open to TBIPS SA Holders who currently hold a TBIPS SA for Tier 2 in the National Capital Region under the EN578-170432 series of SAs. There are security requirements associated with this requirement.

### Contact Information

To obtain more information on how to become a qualified TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holder, please contact the Manager of the Informatics Method of Supply (IMOS) at hubert.degbegnidossou@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Tender Documents

The solicitation document is available in PDF format only at the following URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18056484?extsite=MTgwNTY0ODRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.

### Eligibility Criteria

Only TBIPS SA Holders who currently hold a TBIPS SA for Tier 2 in the required resource categories and in the National Capital Region under the EN578-170432 series of SAs are eligible to compete.
